title: Roadmap to Becoming a Proficient React Developer in India

steps.desc: Master the Fundamentals of JavaScript: Understand variables, data types, functions, DOM manipulation, and ES6+ features.
steps.roadmapdesc: Laying a solid foundation in JavaScript is crucial before diving into React. Focus on asynchronous programming, closures, and prototypal inheritance.

youtube.title: JavaScript Full Course for free üåê (2024)
JavaScript Full Course 2024: Learn JavaScript A-Z for Free | Beginner to Advanced | Class 11
JavaScript Full Course 2024: Learn JavaScript A-Z for Free | Beginner to Advanced | Class 10
JavaScript Complete Course In Hindi (2025)
JavaScript Full Course 2024: Learn JavaScript A-Z for Free | Beginner to Advanced | Class 09

steps.desc: Learn HTML and CSS: Grasp the structure of web pages and how to style them effectively. Focus on responsive design principles and CSS preprocessors like Sass or Less.
steps.roadmapdesc: Understanding HTML and CSS allows you to structure and style your React components effectively. Responsive design is crucial for creating accessible web applications.

youtube.title: Learn Web Design - Responsive Web Design
DRY CSS -- Theories, methods and tools for efficient and scalable Stylesheets #wcmtl2012
Frontend Developer Roadmap for Beginners 2023-24: A Comprehensive Guide
Strategy Guide to CSS Custom Properties - Mike Riethmuller
Harry Roberts: CSS for Software Engineers for CSS Developers

steps.desc: Introduction to React: Understand the core concepts of React, including components, JSX, props, and state. Set up a basic React development environment.
steps.roadmapdesc: Focus on understanding the component-based architecture of React. Practice creating and composing components, passing data through props, and managing state.

youtube.title: React Tutorial for Beginners
Components, Props and JSX in React | Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #106
Learn React JS with Project in 2 Hours  | React Tutorial for Beginners | React Project Crash Course
ReactJS Tutorial for Beginners | Learn React in 2.5 Hours | Part 1
ReactJs Crash Course: Master the Basics in One Video! Ignite Your Front-End Mastery Series!

steps.desc: Working with Components and Props: Learn how to create reusable components and pass data between them using props. Understand different types of components (functional vs. class).
steps.roadmapdesc: Practice creating different types of components and passing data effectively. Focus on component composition and creating a modular architecture.

youtube.title: Understanding Props and PropTypes in React | Complete React Course in Hindi #6
React Components in Hindi | Functional Component in React JS Hindi in 2020 #18
Functional Components & Props & useState Hook
Props, Creating & Nesting Components, Component States, setState | ReactJS Training Course | Uplatz
Components, Props and JSX in React | Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #106

steps.desc: State Management: Learn how to manage component state and update the UI dynamically. Understand the concept of immutability and how to use setState properly.
steps.roadmapdesc: Master the `useState` hook in functional components and the `setState` method in class components. Understand how to update state correctly and avoid common pitfalls.

youtube.title: Subjecting State to Good Behavior - Kim Maida
React Course Introduction
React in an Hour
Portals in React and Vue.js - Rob Komaromi
01 - React Lifecycle In-Depth by James Polanco

steps.desc: Handling Events: Learn how to handle user events like clicks, form submissions, and keyboard input. Understand event binding and how to access event data.
steps.roadmapdesc: Practice handling different types of events and accessing event data. Focus on event delegation and optimizing event handling performance.

youtube.title: #23: Event Handling in React: Synthetic Events, Naming Conventions of Events & Functions & More
Deep Dive into Angular: Event Binding Techniques
Events in Javascript | chai aur #javascript
Javascript & jQuery Tutorial for Beginners Tutorial 4 - Handle the Events in jQuery
javascript 6 || keyboard events || data binding -1

steps.desc: Working with Forms: Learn how to create and manage forms in React. Understand controlled and uncontrolled components, and how to validate form data.
steps.roadmapdesc: Practice building different types of forms and handling form submissions. Focus on validation and error handling to ensure data integrity.

youtube.title: Form Validation using React | React Forms Handling & Validation Tutorial | React Sign up Form
Modern React Tutorials - React Forms
Part 19 Controlled way React forms | React | React Forms | Form validations | Error handling
React Hook Form - Complete Tutorial (with Zod)
How to Handle Forms In React | Multiple Form Handling In ReactJS

steps.desc: Lists and Keys: Learn how to render lists of data dynamically using the `map` function. Understand the importance of keys and how to use them effectively.
steps.roadmapdesc: Practice rendering different types of lists and using keys to optimize rendering performance. Understand the concept of reconciliation and how keys help React identify and update elements efficiently.

youtube.title: Flutter Learning Day 6 - Making HTTP calls & render scrollable list view to show data
React Web Series Episode 9 |  Part 3, Map function | React Tutorial in Hindi
Diving into React Essentials: Learning JSX, Props, and Lists: Lecture 29
React Tutorial #4 - Form Handling & How to Render components dynamically(in sinhala)
Understanding Props and PropTypes in React | Complete React Course in Hindi #6

steps.desc: Hooks: Dive deeper into React Hooks, including useState, useEffect, useContext, and custom hooks. Understand how hooks enable you to use state and other React features in functional components.
steps.roadmapdesc: Master the most commonly used hooks and learn how to create your own custom hooks to encapsulate reusable logic. Understand the rules of hooks and how to avoid common mistakes.

youtube.title: React Hooks - Most Used Features
8 React Hooks in 1 Video
ReactJS & React Hooks Tutorial For Beginners
Understanding React Hooks: useState, useEffect, useContext, useReducer, useRef, useCallback, useMemo
React.js - Custom Hooks Part 1/2: Basic data fetching

steps.desc: Routing: Implement client-side routing using React Router. Learn how to create different routes and navigate between them.
steps.roadmapdesc: Understand the different types of routers (BrowserRouter, HashRouter) and how to configure them. Practice creating nested routes and passing data between routes.

youtube.title: React Router - Complete Tutorial
React router crash course
Learn React Router v6 In 45 Minutes
React router crash course
Lec 2 # Mastering React Routing: A Comprehensive Guide to Navigating Your Web App with React Router

steps.desc: API Integration: Learn how to fetch data from APIs using `fetch` or `axios`. Understand how to handle asynchronous operations and display data in your components.
steps.roadmapdesc: Practice making different types of API requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) and handling different types of responses. Focus on error handling and displaying loading indicators.

youtube.title: Fetching Data in React - Complete Tutorial
Handle APIs like a pro in Reactjs | Custom react query | Axios | Race condition
Complete Axios in React for Beginners in Hindi
Last Lecture : Fetch API with Project | JavaScript Full Course
ReactJS Tutorial - How To Get Data From An API With React | Fetch API | ReactJS Tutorial in Hindi

steps.desc: State Management Libraries: Explore state management libraries like Redux or Zustand. Understand how they help you manage complex application state effectively.
steps.roadmapdesc: Learn the core concepts of Redux (actions, reducers, store) and how to connect your React components to the store. Understand the benefits of using Redux or Zustand for managing global state.

youtube.title: React.JS State Management: Redux vs. Context API
| Learn about State management tool in react with Redux | #learnwithibase #growwithibase
Angular state management with NGRX | NGRX tutorial for beginner | Angular project with NGRX state |
What is my favorite React state management library
React easy state management Zustand

steps.desc: Testing: Learn how to write unit tests and integration tests for your React components using Jest and React Testing Library.
steps.roadmapdesc: Focus on writing tests that cover the core functionality of your components and ensure they behave as expected. Understand the importance of testing and how it helps you build more robust and maintainable applications.
